018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example.row.stats;
019
020import static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.TestRegionSplitCalculator.TEST_UTIL;
021import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
022import static org.junit.Assert.assertNotNull;
023import static org.junit.Assert.assertNull;
024import static org.mockito.ArgumentMatchers.any;
025import static org.mockito.Mockito.mock;
026import static org.mockito.Mockito.when;
027
028import java.io.IOException;
029import java.util.Optional;
030import org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration;
031import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.NamespaceDescriptor;
032import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.SingleProcessHBaseCluster;
033import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.BufferedMutatorParams;
034import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Connection;
035import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ConnectionFactory;
036import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example.row.stats.recorder.RowStatisticsTableRecorder;
037import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example.row.stats.utils.RowStatisticsTableUtil;
038import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.Counter;
039import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.impl.CounterImpl;
040import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Bytes;
041import org.junit.Before;
042import org.junit.BeforeClass;
043import org.junit.Test;
044import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
045import org.mockito.junit.MockitoJUnitRunner;
046
047@RunWith(MockitoJUnitRunner.class)
048public class TestRowStatisticsTableRecorder {
049
050  private static final NamespaceDescriptor NAMESPACE_DESCRIPTOR =
051    NamespaceDescriptor.create(RowStatisticsTableUtil.NAMESPACE).build();
052  private static final byte[] FULL_REGION_NAME = Bytes.toBytes("fullRegionName");
053  private static SingleProcessHBaseCluster cluster;
054  private static Connection connection;
055  private RowStatisticsImpl rowStatistics;
056  private Counter counter;
057
058  @BeforeClass
059  public static void setUpClass() throws Exception {
060    cluster = TEST_UTIL.startMiniCluster(1);
061    connection = ConnectionFactory.createConnection(cluster.getConf());
062    connection.getAdmin().createNamespace(NAMESPACE_DESCRIPTOR);
063    // need this table to write to
064    TEST_UTIL.createTable(RowStatisticsTableUtil.NAMESPACED_TABLE_NAME, RowStatisticsTableUtil.CF);
065  }
066
067  @Before
068  public void setup() {
069    rowStatistics = mock(RowStatisticsImpl.class);
070    counter = new CounterImpl();
071  }
072
073  @Test
074  public void itReturnsNullRecorderOnFailedBufferedMutator() throws IOException {
075    Connection badConnection = mock(Connection.class);
076    Configuration conf = mock(Configuration.class);
077    when(badConnection.getConfiguration()).thenReturn(conf);
078    when(badConnection.getBufferedMutator(any(BufferedMutatorParams.class)))
079      .thenThrow(IOException.class);
080    RowStatisticsTableRecorder recorder =
081      RowStatisticsTableRecorder.forClusterConnection(badConnection, counter, counter);
082    assertNull(recorder);
083  }
084
085  @Test
086  public void itDoesNotIncrementCounterWhenRecordSucceeds() throws IOException {
087    RowStatisticsTableRecorder recorder =
088      RowStatisticsTableRecorder.forClusterConnection(connection, counter, counter);
089    assertNotNull(recorder);
090    recorder.record(rowStatistics, Optional.of(FULL_REGION_NAME));
091    assertEquals(counter.getCount(), 0);
092  }
093
094  @Test
095  public void itIncrementsCounterWhenRecordFails() throws IOException {
096    RowStatisticsTableRecorder recorder =
097      RowStatisticsTableRecorder.forClusterConnection(connection, counter, counter);
098    assertNotNull(recorder);
099    recorder.close();
100    recorder.record(rowStatistics, Optional.of(FULL_REGION_NAME));
101    assertEquals(counter.getCount(), 1);
102  }
103}
